challengeName: TC Community Site - Header Footer UX Update
detailedRequirements:
Challenge Requirements

In this challenge, we want to update the old TopCoder community site to use the new header and footer implemented in the provided prototype. The new header and footer should only be applied to new theme (http://community.topcoder.com/tc?module=EditTheme, choose "new topcoder Theme". The old black and red theme should be kept unchanged (http://community.topcoder.com/tc?module=EditTheme, choose "old TopCoder theme").

For the header

  • The icons of the menu dropdown are not avaiable yet, please still use the placeholder icon each item like the prototype. Please figure out the correct hyperlink for each item, if you're not sure about which link to use, ask in the challenge forum.
  • For each hyperlink, please do NOT hardcode the server name. Make sure the links are correct under Prod, QA, Dev env (www.topcoder.com, www.topcoder-qa.com and www.topcoder-dev.com)
  • The register and login button should links to the correct links.
  • After login, the logout link the same as current website should be displayed.
  • After login, the username dropdown menu should be implemented and links to the correct pages.
  • For the search function (i.e. magnifier icon), please implement like the following
    • Clicking the icon should pull down a search box.
    • Change the default text to "find people". This will only be a member search for now.
    • Remove the type ahead feature.
    • When the user hits enter (if there is text already entered), submit the text to the current member search page. For example, https://www.topcoder.com/search?s=tony&scope=member

For the footer

  • Please figure out the correct hyperlink for each item, if you're not sure about which link to use, ask in the challenge forum.
  • For each hyperlink, please do NOT hardcode the server name. Make sure the links are correct under Prod, QA, Dev env (www.topcoder.com, www.topcoder-qa.com and www.topcoder-dev.com)

Input document

  • The prototype is attached in the challenge forum - documents section.

VM Environment

You need a TopCoder VM to work on this challenge.

Information about VM can be found below:

VM specific information is found here: http://www.topcoder.com/wiki/display/docs/VM+Image+2.5. Upon registration as a submitter or reviewer you will need to request a VM based on the new TopCoder Cockpit/Direct image. To request your image, please use the forum. Before requesting your VM, you need to ensure that you have an SSH key created and in your member profile. Instructions to do so are here: http://www.topcoder.com/wiki/display/projects/Generate+SSH+Key, and instructions to connect afterwards are here: http://www.topcoder.com/wiki/display/projects/Connect+Using+SSH+Key.

Source Repo:

https://coder.topcoder.com/internal/web_module/trunk

HEAD revision 85652

or use the branch https://coder.topcoder.com/internal/web_module/branches/ux_refresh_header_footer

If you don't have SVN permission, please send a request to support@topcoder.com
finalSubmissionGuidelines:
• The added / updated files
  • A simple deployment guide with verification details.
